title: Authorizes the issuance of small business health insurance policies
summary: Enacts the "small business health insurance act"; authorizes the issuance of small business health insurance policies; sets forth eligibility requirements for small business health insurance, requirements for insurers who write small business health insurance policies, and the core benefits required to be covered by such policies.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to authorizing the issuance of small business health insurance policies
